events.name: EU sanctions against Russia
events.wd_description: The European Union is discussing further sanction packages to be levied against Russia due to its continued invasion of Ukraine. These sanctions aim to target oil and other economic areas to deter further military aggression.
events.description: The European Union is discussing further sanction packages to be levied against Russia due to its continued invasion of Ukraine. These sanctions aim to target oil and other economic areas to deter further military aggression.

events.name: Sanctions discussion
events.wd_description: Several EU leaders are building sanctions regarding oil and other economic deterrents.
events.description: Several EU leaders are building sanctions regarding oil and other economic deterrents.

events.name: Bucha aftermath
events.wd_description: The discovery of slain Ukrainian civilians in Bucha has intensified the call for further sanctions against Russia.
events.description: The discovery of slain Ukrainian civilians in Bucha has intensified the call for further sanctions against Russia.

events.name: EU leaders involvement
events.wd_description: Leaders of Ireland, Lithuania, and Denmark, among others, are involved in this next round of sanctions against Russia, hoping that the measures will lead to Russia's withdrawal from Ukraine.
events.description: Leaders of Ireland, Lithuania, and Denmark, among others, are involved in this next round of sanctions against Russia, hoping that the measures will lead to Russia's withdrawal from Ukraine.

events.name: Resignation of Boris Bondarev
events.wd_description: Boris Bondarev, a counselor at the Russian permanent mission to the UN in Geneva, resigned from his position, criticizing Putin's war as aggressive and based on lies.
events.description: Boris Bondarev, a counselor at the Russian permanent mission to the UN in Geneva, resigned from his position, criticizing Putin's war as aggressive and based on lies.

events.name: Bondarev's resignation
events.wd_description: Bondarev, the counselor on arms control, is the only high-level diplomat to resign from the Russian foreign ministry since the war began in February.
events.description: Bondarev, the counselor on arms control, is the only high-level diplomat to resign from the Russian foreign ministry since the war began in February.

events.name: Bondarev's criticism of the war
events.wd_description: Bondarev called the war an aggressive move by Putin driven by lies, warmongering, and hatred, and noted that other diplomats feel similarly but are unlikely to speak out.
events.description: Bondarev called the war an aggressive move by Putin driven by lies, warmongering, and hatred, and noted that other diplomats feel similarly but are unlikely to speak out.

events.name: Reactions to Bondarev's resignation
events.wd_description: Hillel Neuer, executive director of UN Watch, commended Bondarev and urged other diplomats to follow his example.
events.description: Hillel Neuer, executive director of UN Watch, commended Bondarev and urged other diplomats to follow his example.

events.name: Bondarev's future considerations
events.wd_description: When asked about returning to Russia, Bondarev indicated that it would not be a good idea right now.
events.description: When asked about returning to Russia, Bondarev indicated that it would not be a good idea right now.

events.name: Severe flooding in southern China, June 2022
events.wd_label: Severe flooding in southern China, June 2022
events.wd_description: Tens of thousands of people were evacuated due to severe flooding in southern China, particularly affecting the Guangdong and Jiangxi provinces, with more rain expected and significant disruptions in daily life.
events.description: Tens of thousands of people were evacuated due to severe flooding in southern China, particularly affecting the Guangdong and Jiangxi provinces, with more rain expected and significant disruptions in daily life.

events.name: Flooding in Guangdong
events.wd_description: The flooding in Guangdong led to the suspension of classes, office work, and public transportation, with tens of thousands of people evacuated and widespread damage in Shaoguan, Heyuan, and Meizhou.
events.description: The flooding in Guangdong led to the suspension of classes, office work, and public transportation, with tens of thousands of people evacuated and widespread damage in Shaoguan, Heyuan, and Meizhou.

events.name: Impact on Jiangxi province
events.wd_description: In Jiangxi province, nearly 500,000 people have had their homes damaged and lives uprooted due to the flooding, with similar levels of impact as in Guangdong.
events.description: In Jiangxi province, nearly 500,000 people have had their homes damaged and lives uprooted due to the flooding, with similar levels of impact as in Guangdong.

events.name: Government response and historical context
events.wd_description: The government has invested heavily in flood control, including projects like the Three Gorges Dam, following the devastating floods of 1998, which resulted in over 2,000 deaths and the destruction of nearly 3 million homes.
events.description: The government has invested heavily in flood control, including projects like the Three Gorges Dam, following the devastating floods of 1998, which resulted in over 2,000 deaths and the destruction of nearly 3 million homes.

events.name: CATL Launches Third-Generation CTP Qilin Battery
events.wd_label: CATL Launches Third-Generation CTP Qilin Battery
events.wd_description: On June 23, CATL unveiled the third-generation CTP Qilin battery, featuring the highest system integration globally, with a volume utilization rate exceeding 72% and an energy density of up to 255Wh/kg, enabling a range of 1000 kilometers.
events.description: On June 23, CATL unveiled the third-generation CTP Qilin battery, featuring the highest system integration globally, with a volume utilization rate exceeding 72% and an energy density of up to 255Wh/kg, enabling a range of 1000 kilometers.

events.name: Battery Performance
events.wd_description: The Qilin battery achieves a volume utilization rate exceeding 72% and an energy density of up to 255Wh/kg, allowing a range of 1000 kilometers.
events.description: The Qilin battery achieves a volume utilization rate exceeding 72% and an energy density of up to 255Wh/kg, allowing a range of 1000 kilometers.

events.name: Structural Innovations
events.wd_description: CATL has redefined battery structure design by integrating transverse and longitudinal beams, water-cooling plates, and thermal pads into a multifunctional elastic interlayer, enhancing reliability and durability.
events.description: CATL has redefined battery structure design by integrating transverse and longitudinal beams, water-cooling plates, and thermal pads into a multifunctional elastic interlayer, enhancing reliability and durability.

events.name: Multifunctional Elastic Interlayer
events.wd_description: The Qilin battery integrates transverse and longitudinal beams, water-cooling plates, and thermal pads into a multifunctional elastic interlayer that improves cell reliability and durability.
events.description: The Qilin battery integrates transverse and longitudinal beams, water-cooling plates, and thermal pads into a multifunctional elastic interlayer that improves cell reliability and durability.

events.name: Space Structure Redesign
events.wd_description: Utilizing precise calculations and AI simulations, CATL has optimized the space structure to release 6% of energy space while meeting safety standards.
events.description: Utilizing precise calculations and AI simulations, CATL has optimized the space structure to release 6% of energy space while meeting safety standards.

events.name: Thermal Management
events.wd_description: CATL introduced the world's first large-area cell cooling technology, which places water-cooling functions between cells, quadrupling the heat exchange area and halving cell temperature control time.
events.description: CATL introduced the world's first large-area cell cooling technology, which places water-cooling functions between cells, quadrupling the heat exchange area and halving cell temperature control time.

events.name: Fast Charging Capability
events.wd_description: The Qilin battery supports a 5-minute hot start and 10-minute fast charging, significantly improving efficiency.
events.description: The Qilin battery supports a 5-minute hot start and 10-minute fast charging, significantly improving efficiency.

events.name: Enhanced Safety
events.wd_description: The cooling system allows rapid temperature reduction in extreme situations, preventing abnormal heat conduction between cells and ensuring thermal stability and safety.
events.description: The cooling system allows rapid temperature reduction in extreme situations, preventing abnormal heat conduction between cells and ensuring thermal stability and safety.
